mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.m_code,m.m_poster,m.m_title,mh.mh_name,m.m_startdate, m.m_enddate, ROUND(SUM(b_count) / (SELECT SUM(b_count) FROM booking WHERE b_date = TRUNC(SYSDATE)) * 100, 2) AS booking_rate, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY ROUND(SUM(b_count) / (SELECT SUM(b_count) FROM booking WHERE b_date = TRUNC(SYSDATE)) * 100, 2) DESC) AS rank FROM booking b JOIN musical_option mo ON b.mo_code = mo.mo_code JOIN musical m ON m.m_code = mo.m_code JOIN musical_hall mh ON m.mh_code = mh.mh_code WHERE b.b_date = TRUNC(SYSDATE) and m.m_viewstate = 1 GROUP BY m.m_code, m.m_poster, m.m_title, mh.mh_name, m.m_startdate, m.m_enddate ) WHERE rank <= 10 ORDER BY rank

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.m_code, m.m_poster, m.m_title, mh.mh_name, m.m_startdate, m.m_enddate, ROUND(SUM(b_count) / (SELECT SUM(b_count) FROM booking WHERE b_date BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 7) * 100, 2) AS booking_rate, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY ROUND(SUM(b_count) / (SELECT SUM(b_count) FROM booking WHERE b_date BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 7) * 100, 2) DESC) AS rank FROM booking b JOIN musical_option mo ON b.mo_code = mo.mo_code JOIN musical m ON m.m_code = mo.m_code JOIN musical_hall mh ON m.mh_code = mh.mh_code WHERE b.b_date BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') + 7 AND m.m_viewstate = 1 GROUP BY m.m_code, m.m_poster, m.m_title, mh.mh_name, m.m_startdate, m.m_enddate ) WHERE rank <= 10 ORDER BY rank

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT m.m_code,m.m_poster,m.m_title,mh.mh_name,m.m_startdate, m.m_enddate, ROUND((SUM(b_count) / (SELECT SUM(b_count) FROM booking WHERE b_date BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') + INTERVAL '1' MONTH - INTERVAL '1' SECOND)) * 100, 2) AS booking_rate, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY ROUND((SUM(b_count) / (SELECT SUM(b_count) FROM booking WHERE b_date BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') + INTERVAL '1' MONTH - INTERVAL '1' SECOND)) * 100, 2) DESC) AS rank FROM booking b JOIN musical_option mo ON b.mo_code = mo.mo_code JOIN musical m ON m.m_code = mo.m_code JOIN musical_hall mh ON m.mh_code = mh.mh_code WHERE b.b_date BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') + INTERVAL '1' MONTH - INTERVAL '1' SECOND and m.m_viewstate = 1 GROUP BY m.m_code, m.m_poster, m.m_title, mh.mh_name, m.m_startdate, m.m_enddate ) WHERE rank <= 10 ORDER BY rank
